name: The Stellium Conflict
description:
Scifi Space Story/360 Shooter.

Humans have advanced into a multi-planet civilization. Some stelliums accept this... others however feel we don't belong among the stars and need to be dealt with.

You are defender pilot employed by the Terran Observer Group to protect traded routes and defend the artificial anomalies that serve as jump gates for distant travel.
Complete missions, destroy enemies,  build rapport with the Fellowship of stelliums.

Work In Progress. More to come...
